Bash(python -c "
# Check that the chat endpoint still has the correct structure
with open\(''backend/src/api/chat.py'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)
    list_count = content.count\(''# List tasks intent detection''\)
    complete_count = content.count\(''# Complete/mark done intent detection''\)
    delete_count = content.count\(''# Delete/remove intent detection''\)
    create_count = content.count\(''# Create/update task intent detection''\)

print\(f''Intent detection blocks: {list_count} list, {complete_count} complete, {delete_count} delete, {create_count} create''\)
print\(f''All singletons \(no duplicates\): {list_count == 1 and complete_count == 1 and delete_count == 1 and create_count == 1}''\)
")
